MCQ: Who coined the term machine learning in 1959?
Choices: a: Donald Hebb|b: Walter Pitts|c: Arthur Samuel|d: Warren McCulloch

MCQ: What was the earliest machine learning model introduced by Arthur Samuel?
Choices: a: Program for calculating winning chance in chess|b: Program for calculating winning chance in checkers|c: Program for calculating winning chance in tic-tac-toe|d: Program for calculating winning chance in poker

MCQ: Who proposed the early mathematical models of neural networks for machine learning algorithms?
Choices: a: Donald Hebb|b: Walter Pitts|c: Arthur Samuel|d: Warren McCulloch

MCQ: What did the experimental 'learning machine' called Cybertron developed by Raytheon Company analyze using rudimentary reinforcement learning?
Choices: a: Weather patterns|b: Sonar signals|c: Traffic patterns|d: Social media data

MCQ: According to Tom M. Mitchell, what is the definition of a computer program learning from experience in machine learning?
Choices: a: Improving performance at tasks with respect to some class of tasks|b: Improving performance at tasks with respect to some class of tasks without experience|c: Not improving performance at tasks with respect to some class of tasks|d: Improving performance at tasks with respect to some class of tasks with experience
